About Welcome to the spectacular Emerald Isle Hotel, where luxury and tranquility await you in a breathtaking island paradise. Nestled on the pristine shores of a hidden gem in the shimmering ocean, our hotel embodies the epitome of elegance and sophistication. From the moment you arrive, you will be enveloped in a world of beauty and serenity, where every detail has been meticulously designed to ensure your ultimate comfort and relaxation. As you step through the grand entrance of the Emerald Isle Hotel, you will be greeted by the gentle sea breeze and the soothing sounds of the waves crashing against the shore. The elegant architecture of the hotel reflects the natural beauty that surrounds it, with lush greenery and vibrant flowers adorning every corner. The inviting warmth of the sun embraces you, inviting you to leave your worries behind and immerse yourself in the tranquility of this idyllic paradise. Each of our luxurious guest rooms and suites has been thoughtfully designed to provide you with a sanctuary of peace and comfort. From the opulent furnishings to the plush bedding and the stunning views of the ocean beyond, every detail has been carefully curated to ensure that your stay is nothing short of perfect. Sink into the soft embrace of the king-sized bed, unwind in the lavish marble bathroom, or simply relax on your private balcony and watch the sun set over the horizon in a blaze of colors. Indulge your senses in our world-class dining experiences, where culinary delights await you at every turn. From the fresh catch of the day at our seafood restaurant to the succulent steaks at our gourmet grill, our talented chefs will take you on a journey of flavors and aromas that will leave you craving more. Sip on a handcrafted cocktail at our chic bar, or savor a glass of fine wine as you watch the stars twinkle in the night sky from our outdoor terrace. Every meal is a celebration of the senses, a symphony of tastes and textures that will leave you wanting to return for more. Unwind and rejuvenate your body and mind at our world-class spa, where a range of luxurious treatments and therapies await you. From soothing massages to invigorating facials, our expert therapists will pamper you from head to toe, leaving you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. Immerse yourself in the warm waters of our infinity pool, or unwind in the tranquil embrace of our hot tub, surrounded by the lush tropical gardens that envelop you in a cocoon of peace and serenity. For those seeking adventure and excitement, the Emerald Isle Hotel offers a range of activities and experiences that will ignite your sense of wonder and exploration. Set sail on a private boat tour of the island, where you can snorkel in crystal-clear waters, swim with dolphins, or simply relax on the deck and soak up the sun. Explore the lush jungle trails that wind through the island, or take a leisurely bike ride along the scenic coastal roads, where the stunning vistas will take your breath away. At the Emerald Isle Hotel, your every need is our top priority, and our dedicated staff is at your service to ensure that your stay is nothing short of perfect. Whether you require assistance with reservations, recommendations for local attractions, or simply a friendly smile and warm greeting, our team is here to make your experience unforgettable. From the moment you arrive to the moment you depart, we strive to exceed your expectations and create memories that will last a lifetime. Come and experience the magic of the Emerald Isle Hotel, where luxury meets tranquility in a paradise like no other. Indulge in the beauty of our pristine surroundings, the opulence of our accommodations, and the warmth of our hospitality, and discover a world of wonder and delight that will captivate your heart and soul. Your journey to paradise begins here, at the Emerald Isle Hotel â€“ where every moment is a treasure, and every memory is a precious gem. Booking FAQ Can I bring my pet to Emerald Isle? Yes, we welcome well-behaved pets at Emerald Isle. Just be sure to notify us in advance so we can accommodate you and your furry friend. Is there a pool at Emerald Isle? Yes, we have a beautiful outdoor pool for our guests to enjoy during their stay. Does Emerald Isle offer room service? Yes, we offer room service from our onsite restaurants during certain hours. Please check the amenities guide in your room for more information. Are there any spa services available at Emerald Isle? Yes, we have a full-service spa on-site offering a variety of treatments and services to help you relax and unwind during your stay. Is parking available for guests at Emerald Isle? Yes, we offer complimentary parking for our guests during their stay at Emerald Isle. What dining options are available at Emerald Isle? We have multiple dining options at Emerald Isle, including casual and fine dining restaurants, as well as a cafe and bar for guests to enjoy. Are there any fitness facilities at Emerald Isle? Yes, we have a fitness center available for guests looking to stay active during their stay at Emerald Isle. Reviews "My stay at Emerald Isle was nothing short of spectacular. The luxurious accommodations, exceptional service, and vibrant casino made for an unforgettable experience. I can't wait to return!" Aisha S. "Emerald Isle truly lives up to its name - a hidden gem nestled in the heart of India. The stunning views, top-notch amenities, and world-class dining options exceeded all of my expectations. I highly recommend this casino-hotel to anyone looking for a lavish getaway." Raj K. "From the moment I arrived at Emerald Isle, I was greeted with warm hospitality and a sense of luxury. The casino offered a wide variety of games, the rooms were elegant and spacious, and the staff went above and beyond to ensure my stay was nothing short of perfection. I can't wait to come back!" Sofia P. "I had the pleasure of staying at Emerald Isle for a weekend getaway, and it was truly a dream come true. The casino ambiance was electrifying, the rooms were beautifully appointed, and the dining options were exquisite. I was thoroughly impressed with every aspect of my stay and will definitely be returning soon!" Arjun R. "Emerald Isle is a paradise for anyone looking to indulge in luxury and excitement. The casino-hotel offers a seamless blend of opulence and entertainment, making it the ideal destination for a memorable vacation. I was blown away by the impeccable service and attention to detail - a truly wonderful experience that I won't soon forget." Priya M. "My stay at Emerald Isle was a true escape from reality. The serene surroundings, modern amenities, and lively casino atmosphere provided the perfect balance of relaxation and entertainment. I can't wait to plan my next visit and explore everything this exceptional destination has to offer." Karan S. "Emerald Isle exceeded all of my expectations and then some. The luxurious accommodations, impeccable service, and thrilling casino experience combined to create a stay that was truly unforgettable. I felt like royalty from the moment I arrived - a truly memorable experience that I will cherish forever." Natasha D. "Staying at Emerald Isle was an absolute delight. The casino-hotel seamlessly combines luxury with excitement, offering guests a one-of-a-kind experience. From the opulent rooms to the vibrant casino floor, every aspect of my stay was impeccable.
